education.name: Kristiania University College
education.description:
During the study, I gained a practical competence within:

  • Design of visual information dashboards based on big data,
  • Knowledge and practical skills in the development of mobile solutions, Internet of Things and modern architectures,
  • Expertise within interactive technology and software integration.

Other focuses: System development and applied informatics, information visualisation, IT architecture, interactive use of technology, project management and agile methods
